# gitcreds

> Query git credentials from R

Query git credentials from R

## Installation

Once on CRAN, install the package as usual:

```{r eval = FALSE}
install.packages("gitcreds")
```

## Usage

```{r eval = FALSE}
library(gitcreds)
```
